name: HACHIK0MA
description:
Hachik0ma is a robot tasked with restoring a desolate world by repairing purification facilities.

Controls:
X - Bio-restoration.
Z - Technology repair (used on purifiers).
Arrow Keys - Move

This game was created for the first Sheffield Game Jam in 24 hours by The 88th Dimension:
Abby - Graphics, Sound Effects
Ben (Midcode) - Programming, Post-Jam Polish
Louis - Graphics, Music, Level Design
Rachel - Graphics
Tom - Graphics, Sound Effects

Tools:
ASEprite - Graphics
SFXR / BFXR - Sound Effects
Bosca Ceoil - Music
Audacity - Sound / Music
Tiled - Level Editor

Written in Haxe, with the HaxePunk engine. Also used HaxePunk Tiled to import levels.
